triples.name: Sentiment analysis
triples.relevance: Core method used to extract mood states from Twitter content by analyzing emotional polarity of text.

triples.name: Twitter
triples.relevance: Social media platform serving as the primary data source for analyzing public mood through aggregated tweets.

triples.name: Psychometrics
triples.relevance: Framework providing psychometric instrument techniques for extracting and measuring the six psychological mood dimensions.

triples.name: Mood (psychology)
triples.relevance: The paper proposes analyzing six mood dimensions (tension, depression, anger, vigor, fatigue, confusion) through computational analysis of social media.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Computational technique enabling automated analysis and interpretation of large-scale Twitter text to extract emotional content.

triples.name: Economic indicator
triples.relevance: Paper examines correlation between public mood and economic indicators to model collective emotional trends with predictive potential.

triples.name: Social media analytics
triples.relevance: Paper proposes large-scale sentiment and mood analysis of social media as a novel approach for understanding collective emotions and socio-economic phenomena.
